column5: Those do look awesome Danbo....but ya better use a wire leader at over $50 .
We are livin' in some crazy times, aren't we?

These have roughly the same design as the HMNG popper and they're half the price. I have a couple and they're absolutely stunning. They're a functional piece of art.    http://www.tackletour.com/reviewmbpopmax.html
For the Japanese, creating lures is art more than it is to catch fish. I highly doubt those 60 dollar poppers would work any better than a Pop-R. Something to put in a display case more likely.
Wow I want one. but I would probably be to scarde of loosing it!! They are a bit pricie but I'm sure they are worth it, looks like a lot of work went into making them.
The lures seem to have a noise feature to them too; they take water in the mouth and exit via the "gills".  Untested and for $59 I'll leave it to the millionaires to test them.
